All Thumbs.description: -2 to use mechanical or electrical devices

Anemic.description: -2 to Vigor rolls to resist Fatigue

Arrogant.description: Must humiliate opponent, challenge the most powerful foe

Bad Eyes (Minor).description: -1 to all Trait rolls dependent on vision, or -2 if glasses are broken/lost

Bad Eyes (Major).description: -2 to all Trait rolls dependent on vision, or -4 if glasses are broken/lost

Bad Luck.description: The character gets one less Benny per session

Big Mouth.description: Unable to keep secrets and constantly gives away information

Blind.description: -6 to all tasks that require vision, -2 to most other actions

Bloodthirsty.description: Never takes prisoners unless under the direct supervision of a superior

Can't Swim.description: -2 to Athletics (swimming) rolls and each inch moved in water costs 3 inches of Pace

Clueless.description: -1 to Common Knowledge and Notice rolls

Code of Honor.description: The character keeps his word and acts like a gentleman

Curious.description: The character wants to know about everything

Death Wish.description: The hero wants to die after or while completing some epic task

Delusional (Minor).description: The individual believes something that is quite simply not true

Delusional (Major).description: The individual believes something that is quite simply not true (major)

Doubting Thomas.description: The character doesn't believe in the supernatural until forced to

Driven (Minor).description: The hero feels compelled to pursue some short-term goal

Driven (Major).description: The hero feels compelled to pursue some long-term goal

Elderly.description: Pace -1, Strength and Vigor drop a die type, 5 extra skill points

Enemy (Minor).description: The character has a recurring nemesis of some sort

Enemy (Major).description: The character has a powerful recurring nemesis

Greedy (Minor).description: The individual is obsessed with wealth and material possessions

Greedy (Major).description: The individual is obsessed with wealth and material possessions (major)

Habit (Minor).description: Drinking, drugs, or other physical addiction

Habit (Major).description: Drinking, drugs, or other physical addiction (major)

Heroic.description: The character always helps those in need

Hesitant.description: The character draws two Action Cards and acts on the lower of the two

Illiterate.description: The character cannot read or write

Impulsive.description: The hero leaps before he looks

Jealous (Minor).description: The individual covets what others have

Jealous (Major).description: The individual covets what others have (major)

Loyal.description: The hero is extremely loyal to his friends

Obese.description: Size +1, Pace -1, d4 running die. Treat Str as one die type lower for Athletics

Obligation (Minor).description: The character has a weekly obligation of some sort

Obligation (Major).description: The character has a daily obligation of some sort

Outsider.description: -2 to Persuasion with those of the dominant society

Overconfident.description: The hero believes she can do anything

Pacifist (Minor).description: The character fights only in self-defense and never kills

Pacifist (Major).description: The character won't fight living characters

Phobia (Minor).description: -1 to all Trait rolls in the presence of the phobia

Phobia (Major).description: -2 to all Trait rolls in the presence of the phobia

Poverty.description: Half starting funds, unable to hang onto more than pocket change

Quirk.description: The individual has some minor foible or strange mannerism

Ruthless (Minor).description: The character does what it takes to get her way

Ruthless (Major).description: The character does what it takes to get her way (major)

Secret (Minor).description: The hero has a secret that causes minor embarrassment

Secret (Major).description: The hero has a secret that causes major life problems

Shamed.description: The individual is haunted by some tragic event from her past

Slow (Minor).description: Pace -1, running die is reduced one step. Neither may take the Fleet-Footed Edge

Slow (Major).description: Pace -2, running die is reduced two steps. Neither may take the Fleet-Footed Edge

Small.description: Size and Toughness are reduced by 1. Size cannot be reduced below -1

Stubborn.description: The character wants his way and rarely admits his mistakes

Suspicious (Major).description: The individual is paranoid. Allies subtract 2 when rolling to Support him

Thin Skinned (Minor).description: The character is particularly susceptible to personal attacks. Subtracts two when resisting Taunt attacks

Thin Skinned (Major).description: The character is particularly susceptible to personal attacks. Subtracts four when resisting Taunt attacks

Timid.description: -2 to Fear checks and resisting Intimidation

Tongue-Tied.description: The character often misspeaks or can't get her words out. -1 to Intimidation, Persuasion, and Taunt rolls

Ugly (Minor).description: The character is physically unattractive and subtracts 1 from Persuasion rolls

Ugly (Major).description: The character is physically unattractive and subtracts 2 from Persuasion rolls

Vengeful (Minor).description: The adventurer seeks payback for slights against her (minor)

Vengeful (Major).description: The adventurer seeks payback for slights against her (major)

Vow (Minor).description: The individual has sworn an oath of some sort

Vow (Major).description: The individual has sworn a major oath

Wanted (Minor).description: The character is a minor criminal

Wanted (Major).description: The character is a major criminal

Yellow.description: -2 to Fear checks and resisting Intimidation

Young.description: 3 attribute points instead of 5, 10 skill points instead of 12, +1 Benny per session
